steps.content: Bisect the circle with a vertical line extending out of the circle at the bottom. Add connecting lines to form the guides to jaws and the chin of the human head.

steps.content: Join three horizontal lines for guides to the eyes, nose and mouth.

steps.content: Draw lemon-shaped circles on either side for the eyes and the a small curved line for the tip of the nose.

steps.title: Draw the realistic lips of the human at the bottom of the nose symmetrical of shape on either side of the vertical dividing line.
steps.content: Draw the realistic lips of the human at the bottom of the nose symmetrical of shape on either side of the vertical dividing line.

steps.title: Make the eye-lids and the eye-brows as well.
steps.content: Make the eye-lids and the eye-brows as well.

steps.title: Create a realistic shape of the ear-outline on either side of the head originating from the eye-level.
steps.content: Create a realistic shape of the ear-outline on either side of the head originating from the eye-level.

steps.content: Erase all sketchy guides and draw clear and final lines.

steps.content: Color the realistic human character.

steps.title: Create a smaller circle and bisect it with a vertical line extending out from the bottom of the circle.
steps.content: Create a smaller circle and bisect it with a vertical line extending out from the bottom of the circle. Make your drawing seem more realistic by adjusting the perspective slightly. A lot of people draw at eye level, rather than adjusting the subject a little bit.

steps.content: Add joining guides for the eyes, nose ,mouth and the outline of the jaw and chin as well.

steps.content: Make neat shapes for the eyes on the eye-line guide and a realistic nose on the vertical line and a pair of lips as well.

steps.content: Create hair on the skull with bunches of irregular hair dropping on either side.
